course.title: Advanced React Development
course.description: Advanced React patterns, performance optimization, and modern development practices

requestDetails.justification: Need to upgrade skills for upcoming project requirements. The team is moving to React 18 and implementing advanced patterns for better performance.
requestDetails.businessImpact: Will improve development velocity and code quality for the new e-commerce platform project.
requestDetails.expectedOutcome: Master advanced React patterns and performance optimization techniques.
requestDetails.timeline: Need to complete training before project kickoff in March 2024.

course.title: Project Management Fundamentals
course.description: Essential project management skills, methodologies, and tools for successful project delivery

requestDetails.justification: Required for new role as team lead. Need to formalize project management skills to effectively manage the product development team.
requestDetails.businessImpact: Will improve project delivery timelines and team coordination for product initiatives.
requestDetails.expectedOutcome: Gain certification in project management and improve team leadership skills.
requestDetails.timeline: Complete training before taking on team lead responsibilities in February 2024.

comments.author: John Smith
comments.comment: Approved. This training aligns with the team lead promotion and will benefit the entire product team.

course.title: Data Science with Python
course.description: Complete data science workflow using Python, including data analysis, visualization, and machine learning

requestDetails.justification: Personal development interest. Want to expand skills beyond basic analytics to include machine learning and advanced data science techniques.
requestDetails.businessImpact: Could potentially contribute to advanced analytics projects and provide insights for business decisions.
requestDetails.expectedOutcome: Learn Python for data science and gain practical experience with machine learning algorithms.
requestDetails.timeline: Flexible timeline, prefer to complete within 3 months.

approval.rejectionReason: Budget constraints for Q1 2024. This training is not directly related to current role requirements. Consider applying for Q2 budget.

comments.author: Jane Doe
comments.comment: While this is valuable training, we need to prioritize training that directly supports current business objectives. Please reapply for Q2 budget.

course.title: AWS Cloud Architecture
course.description: Complete AWS cloud architecture and best practices for scalable applications

requestDetails.justification: Critical for cloud migration project. The team is moving our infrastructure to AWS and need advanced knowledge of cloud architecture patterns.
requestDetails.businessImpact: Essential for successful completion of the cloud migration project that will reduce infrastructure costs by 30%.
requestDetails.expectedOutcome: Master AWS cloud architecture and be able to design scalable, cost-effective cloud solutions.
requestDetails.timeline: Must complete before cloud migration project starts in March 2024.
